function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assumption of equal adoption of STRAVA across cycling and pedestrian communities","Impact":"Misrepresentation of activity levels and potential misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Conduct further work to calibrate relative differences between cycling and pedestrian activities","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for activity and mobility tracking","People":"Cycling and pedestrian recreational communities in Oslo","Owner":"Research institutions, local government, STRAVA developers"},{"Description":"Lack of distinction between cyclists and pedestrians in ground-truth reference counters","Impact":"Inability to accurately analyze and understand activity patterns","Mitigation":"Develop and implement systems for distinguishing between cyclists and pedestrians in ground-truth reference counters","Technologies":"Advanced sensor technologies for activity recognition and tracking","People":"Researchers, data analysts, local government","Owner":"Research institutions, local government, technology developers"},{"Description":"Mitigation of mental health burden under pandemic conditions","Impact":"Failure to address mental health needs and maximize the benefits of green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement policies and urban design strategies that promote physical exercise, mobility, and access to green spaces","Technologies":"Urban design and planning tools, mental health assessment and support systems","People":"Policy-makers, urban planners, mental health professionals","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations"}]}
